description_code: Data, facts or figures about an individual; the set of relevant items would depend on the use case.
comments: Data, facts or figures about an individual; the set of relevant items would depend on the use case.

description_code: An alphanumeric identifier assigned to a specific patient.
comments: An alphanumeric identifier assigned to a specific patient.

description_code: Biological sex is the quality of a biological organism based on reproductive function or organs.
comments: Biological sex is the quality of a biological organism based on reproductive function or organs.

description_code: A biological sex quality inhering in an individual based upon genotypic composition of sex chromosomes.
comments: A biological sex quality inhering in an individual based upon genotypic composition of sex chromosomes.

description_code: Data obtained through patient examination or treatment.
comments: Data obtained through patient examination or treatment.

description_code: Link to the person for which the clinical information was collected.
comments: Link to the person for which the clinical information was collected.

description_code: The age, measured from some defined time point e.g. birth at which a subject (e.g. a human patient) is diagnosed with some disease e.g. breast cancer.
comments: The age, measured from some defined time point e.g. birth at which a subject (e.g. a human patient) is diagnosed with some disease e.g. breast cancer.
